inclusion.criterion: willing and able to comply with protocol requirements
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: female patient post-menopausal or surgically sterilized
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: male patient agrees to use contraception
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: relapsed after one line of treatment but less than three lines
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: laboratory values within 14 days before Baseline
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: serious medical condition or laboratory abnormality
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: condition that places subject at unacceptable risk
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: use of concomitant anti-myeloma drug or therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: known positive for HIV or active infectious hepatitis
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with relapse after one line of treatment, measurable disease, and Karnofsky performance status ≥60%. She is on hemodialysis for ESRD. However, she was previously treated with thalidomide velcade and thalidomide which were eventually held due to worsening edema and kidney function.
